TypeSignature.Value: public delegate System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection QueryForConnectionCallback(LdapConnection primaryConnection, LdapConnection referralFromConnection, string newDistinguishedName, LdapDirectoryIdentifier identifier, NetworkCredential credential, long currentUserToken);
.class public auto ansi sealed QueryForConnectionCallback extends System.MulticastDelegate

Public Delegate Function QueryForConnectionCallback(primaryConnection As LdapConnection, referralFromConnection As LdapConnection, newDistinguishedName As String, identifier As LdapDirectoryIdentifier, credential As NetworkCredential, currentUserToken As Long) As LdapConnection

public delegate System::DirectoryServices::Protocols::LdapConnection ^ QueryForConnectionCallback(LdapConnection ^ primaryConnection, LdapConnection ^ referralFromConnection, System::String ^ newDistinguishedName, LdapDirectoryIdentifier ^ identifier, NetworkCredential ^ credential, long currentUserToken);

param.name: primaryConnection
param.span: Objeto que especifica la conexión principal.

span.span: A object that specifies the primary connection.

param.name: referralFromConnection
param.span: Objeto que especifica la conexión que proporciona la referencia.

span.span: A object that specifies the connection that provides the referral.

param.name: newDistinguishedName
param.span: Objeto que especifica el nombre distintivo (DN) de la entrada deseada en el servidor al que se hace referencia.

span.span: A object that specifies the distinguished name (DN) of the desired entry in the referred server.

param.name: identifier
param.span: Objeto que especifica el identificador para el directorio LDAP al que se hace referencia.

span.span: A object that specifies the identifier for the referred LDAP directory.

param.name: credential
param.span: Objeto que especifica las credenciales que se pasan al servidor al que se hace referencia.

span.span: A object that specifies the credentials to pass to the referred server.
The LUID for the current user.

summary.span: El delegado determina si hay una conexión almacenada en memoria caché disponible para su uso.

span.span: The delegate determines whether there is a cached connection available for use.

returns.span: Se devuelve almacenado en memoria caché, si hay alguno disponible.

span.span: A cached is returned, if there is one available.

returns.span: Si no hay disponible ninguna conexión almacenada en memoria caché, se devuelve .

span.span: If no cached connection is available, is returned.
